description: This file is a CMake script for locating and configuring the Nexus library, defining relevant finders, conditions, and target properties for use in a C++ build environment.

methods.name: find_path
methods.description: Searches for the specified header file 'nexus_config.h' within given path suffixes.

methods.name: find_package_handle_standard_args
methods.description: Handles the standard logic for validating found packages and setting variables accordingly.

methods.name: mark_as_advanced
methods.description: Marks certain variables as advanced in CMake GUIs.

methods.name: add_library
methods.description: Defines an imported target for the Nexus library.

methods.name: set_target_properties
methods.description: Sets properties such as location, include directories, and compile definitions on targets.

methods.name: message
methods.description: Outputs status or error messages during configuration.
